channel.title: How do you run testscape?
channel.description:
Can someone help me I'm new (to the forums, I already know how to edit and make shops :P) OK here's the problem: I got Moparscape V3.2 installed and downloaded testscape(and unziped it) into the main Moparscape folder. But when I load Moparscape it uses the Hybridscape sorce not the testscape sorce how do I make it so it uses testscape not Hybridscape :confused:?
Thanks in advance :o

item.title: How do you run testscape?
item.dc:creator: @gho5t gho5t
item.description:
@gho5t wrote:

Basically, fix your compile.bat file, and your runserver.bat (how to do that can be found in the “how to make a private server” post by flamed fury1)
Then open runserver.bat before starting moparscape, and it should start up on testscape

Read full topic

item.title: How do you run testscape?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Well, MoparScape uses the files in a folder named “HybridScape”. But you can’t just put your testscape files in there or it will crash when you try to load Class.forName(“client”);

You have to use the batch file that comes with testscape and then just open moparscape from the jar file, not as an applet.

Read full topic
